other_tests.findings: Phlegmonous soft tissue mass in the right to mid pelvis, measuring 7.2 x 5.1 cm, slightly larger than previous measurement 6.7 x 4.7 cm. The mass has a hypoenhancing central component with hyperenhancing rim, significant inflammatory changes, and fat stranding surrounding the mass. There are numerous regional nodes likely reactive in nature.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The mass size increased from 6.7 x 4.7 cm to 7.2 x 5.1 cm.
